title: South Africa: Reduce Electricity Usage - Eskom
text:
South Africa: Malema Fraud Charges Dropped - 'Malema Can Play This Game of Politics' 
The evening peak period is between 5pm and 9pm. 
"In winter the electricity demand peaks in the morning and evening as more electricity is used during these times. We appeal to all our customers to continue to reduce their electricity usage throughout the day but to be aware of the need to save more during the peak periods from 6am to 10am and 5pm to 9pm."
